subject: Re: [junit] Testing web applications
msgSnippet: Hi , I have few queries again. According the research i have done JUnitEE can only test J2EE Applications. It cannot test Webappliactions. Cactus can test
messageBody:
Hi ,

I have few queries again.
According the research i have done JUnitEE can only test J2EE Applications.
It cannot test Webappliactions.

Cactus can test webapplications.
Can JUnitEE test struts action classes or we should use only cactus for that?

Thank You,
Swetha


"J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@...> wrote:
swetha yalamanchili wrote:

> I have few queries.I am working on a webapplication project that
> consists of Struts action classes,jsps .I wanted to know where should i
> apply junit testcase .Is it for Jsps or Struts action class.
>
> Please let me know if any one can help me?

Hello, Swetha.

If you are just learning to write JUnit tests, then I recommend putting
your attention in the Action classes. You'll learn a lot there before
trying to apply those ideas to testing JSPs, which are a little more
complicated.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
